page.title: 03S.Clevedon Shopping Complex
page.content: The{Kwik-Save}complex is a very new centre with every kind of shop including a public house.As part of the agreement{Kwik-Save}provided a hall to be used for recreational activities. One group who use it are the {Clevedon Pier}Majorettes They have a main troup and a practice troup. The ages range from 5-15yrs. They have taken part in many local displays and the carnival. {Brownies and Guides} also use the Kwik-Save hall on Friday Nights. Ladies of the area have a {Keep-fit} class several afternoons and evenings. On Saturdays there is a Junior Disco from 10.0am-12.0am. A{Karate club}meets on Mondays. The hall is also used for Jumble Sales and private hire.
